title: Himi 316
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Ke tau fiefia,
‘I he’etau ‘ilo;
Ko hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū,
Ko e Tu’i ia.
2.
Ko e ‘Eiki ia
Pea ‘oku pule,
Ki hēvani, ki ‘olunga,
Pea mo māmani.
3.
’Oku ‘ia Sīsū,
Ke pule mālohi,
Ki he mālohi ‘o heli
Mo Sētani foki.
4.
Pea ‘e mapelu,
‘O tu’ulutui;
‘A e tui kotoa pē,
Ki hotau Misaia.
5.
Tau fai fakataha,
Mo e kau ‘āngelo;
Pea hiva fiefia,
‘I he’ene pule.
6.
’O fai loto taha,
Ki he’ene fekau,
Pea ‘e mafola atu,
‘Ene pule lelei. *
